effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.2 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 600,801.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Crown of Autumnal Flora

spells.description:
Equip: When you enter combat, gain 1 Dormant Gemstone per socketed gem.

Whenever you heal an ally, bestow upon them 1 Empowered Gemstone to increase the potency of one of their socketed gems by 141 for 20 sec. When their gemstone becomes dormant, it is returned to you.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,934 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 209 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Intellect by 2,811, up to 14,056.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 2 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Drape of the Lamplighter

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to call down a Voltaic Stormrook, inflicting 236,959 Nature damage split between nearby enemies and granting 2,530 Haste, further increased for each enemy struck.
